frontmatter.title: Driving Sunset
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of the Shannon V. drawn with Paper for iOS on an iPad.

markdownRemark.html:
PaperFaces portrait of Shannon V. inspired by a photograph on Sktchy.

Sometimes when I feel lazy I go after a silhouette. Shading goes out the window and the only thing you need to be considered with is drawing an accurate contour. The rest is coloring within the lines…

Tools used:

  • Pencil by FiftyThree
  • Paper for iOS
